sourcesContent:
import { WeatherDatas } from 'src/app/modules/models/interfaces/WeatherDatas'; import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { faDroplet, faTemperatureHigh, faTemperatureLow, faWind } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; @Component({ selector: 'app-weather-card', templateUrl: './weather-card.component.html', styleUrls: [] }) export class WeatherCardComponent { @Input() WeatherDatasImput!: WeatherDatas; //Dados da Previsão do Tempo Recebidos Pelo componente Pai minTemperatureIcon = faTemperatureLow; maxTemperatureIcon = faTemperatureHigh; humidityIcon = faDroplet; windIcon = faWind; }
{{WeatherDatasImput.name}}
{{WeatherDatasImput.main.temp | number: '1.0-0'}}°C
Mais Informações
Mínima
{{ WeatherDatasImput.main.temp_min | number: '1.0-0' }}°C
Mínima
{{ WeatherDatasImput.main.temp_min | number: '1.0-0' }}°C
